midi-qol.ItemDeleteCheck.Name: Item Delete Check
midi-qol.ItemDeleteCheck.Hint: Open a confirmation dialog when trying to delete items from character sheet
midi-qol.DamageImmunities.Name: Apply Damage immunities
midi-qol.DamageImmunities.Hint: When using midi-qol damage buttons or auto applying damage apply target's damage immunities/vulnerabilities/resistances. All damage types are checked. Saves - check text is selected check the spell descirption for special strings indicating 1/2 damage
midi-qol.SpeedItemRolls.Name: Enable Speed Item Rolls
midi-qol.SpeedItemRolls.Hint: Midi-qol will use the ctrl/alt/meta/shift key stats when initiating a roll. ctl=disadvantage alt=advantage shift=versatile
midi-qol.AutoFastForward.Name: Auto fast forward rolls
midi-qol.AutoFastForward.Hint: When rolling attack or damage always fast forward rolls
midi-qol.AutoCheckHit.Name: Auto check if attack hits target
midi-qol.AutoCheckHit.Hint: Check if an attack roll hits selected targets - damage is rolled if one or more targets is hit and auto roll damage is true. If disabled midi-qol will assume the attack hits and continue rolling.
midi-qol.RequireTargets.Name: Require targets to be selected before rolling
midi-qol.RequireTargets.Hint: If no tokens are targeted then only self target or aread affect target rolls will be allowed
midi-qol.AutoApplyDamage.Name: Auto apply damage to target
midi-qol.AutoApplyDamage.Hint: Auto apply damage to hit targets (if autocheck hits on) or targets user has selected
midi-qol.ItemRollButtons.Name: Add attack/damage buttons to item inventory list
midi-qol.ItemRollButtons.Hint: Add Roll Buttons to item description - these buttons support ctl/alt/shift to skip the dialog
midi-qol.AddChatDamageButtons.Name: Add damage buttons to chat message
midi-qol.AddChatDamageButtons.Hint: Add Damage buttons to any damage roll chat message - clicking applies damage to all selected tokens (NOT TARGETED) (the same as the drop down menu)
midi-qol.MacroSpeedRolls.Name: Item macros use speed rolls
midi-qol.MacroSpeedRolls.Hint: Item macros dropped to the hotbar call speed rolls
midi-qol.AutoRollDamage.Name: Auto roll Damage
midi-qol.AutoRollDamage.Hint: Automatically roll Damage when an attack roll is made. If auto roll damage is set to attack-hits it will roll damage if no targets are selected, the attack hits (see auto check hits) or hits are not being checkec
midi-qol.AutoCheckSaves.Name: Auto check Saves
midi-qol.AutoCheckSaves.Hint: Automatically check saving throws when a spell is cast. If disabled it will assume that all targets failed their save.
midi-qol.AutoRemoveTargets.Name: Untarget at end of turn
midi-qol.AutoRemoveTargets.Hint: At the end of you turn choose which targets to automatically untarget
midi-qol.noItemNamed: Your selected token does not have an item named
midi-qol.noTokens: Cannot apply effect - no token selected
midi-qol.HideNPCNames.Name: Hide token names
midi-qol.HideNPCNames.Hint: Hide token names in hit/save chat messages
midi-qol.AutoTarget.Name: Auto target on template draw
midi-qol.AutoTarget.Hint: When placing a template (e.g. spell) auto target tokens inside the template.
midi-qol.noGM: No GM user connected cannot apply effects/update Hit Points
midi-qol.showGM.Name: GM Sees all whispered messages
midi-qol.showGM.Hint: GM sees all whispered messages sent even if the game settings say the GM won't see them
midi-qol.ColoredBorders.Name: Colored Border Messages
midi-qol.ColoredBorders.Hint: Each chat message has a border in the player characters color
midi-qol.AutoEffects.Name: Auto apply item effects to targets
midi-qol.AutoEffects.Hint: Automatically apply item active effects to targets if they are hit, failed a save or don't get a save. Requires ddynamiceffects and works better with about-time as well.
midi-qol.RangeTarget.Name: Autotarget for ranged target spells/attacks
midi-qol.RangeTarget.Hint: Auto target for ranged target types if the target type is creature/enemy/ally
midi-qol.PlayerRollSaves.Name: Prompt Players to Roll Saves
midi-qol.PlayerRollSaves.Hint: Players Roll saves. A whispered message or can use LMRTFY if installed
midi-qol.PlayerSaveTimeout.Name: Delay before rolling for players
midi-qol.PlayerSaveTimeout.Hint: How long to wait before taking over the players save for them in seconds
midi-qol.PreRollChecks.Name: Experimental: Apply checks before doing speed/macro roll
midi-qol.PreRollChecks.Hint: Experimental: Checks before doing an item roll; currently in range and roller has > 0 HP
midi-qol.noTargets: Come on, by now you should know that you have to target opponents
midi-qol.UseTokenNames.Name: Chat cards use token name
midi-qol.UseTokenNames.Hint: Chat card titles and target names use the token name rather than the actor name
midi-qol.CriticalDamage.Name: Choose how to roll critical damage
midi-qol.CriticalDamage.Hint: requires foundry 0.7.0 or later. DND5e Default - standard dnd5e critical roll, base max only - base weapon dice only but all maximised, max critical dice - critical dice maximised, max all dice - wepon + critical dice maximised
midi-qol.MergeCard.Name: Merge Rolls to one card
midi-qol.MergeCard.Hint: Merge Attack, Hits, Damage, Saves to a single chat card
midi-qol.MergeCardCondensed.Name: Condense Attack/Damage Rolls
midi-qol.MergeCardCondensed.Hint: Conserve a little chat log space by making attack and damage rolls smaller
midi-qol.CheckSaveText.Name: Search spell description
midi-qol.CheckSaveText.Hint: Search spell description for save type - 'half as much damge'. If unchecked assume a save does 1/2 damage
